p: In the epidemic season of 2017â€“2018, the SRC VB Vector Rospotrebnadzor received autopsy and clinical material from 61 regions of Russia. A total of 983 primary samples were received that were positive for RNA of influenza A and B viruses, including 90 samples of autopsy clinical material, 757 samples from patients with severe disease and 136 samples from patients vaccinated against influenza in the fall of 2017 ( Table 1).
